#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        int n,size;
        cin>>n;
        vector<int>v;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            int a;
            cin>>a;
            v.push_back(a);
        }
        sort(v.begin(),v.end());
        if(n%2==0){
            for(int i=0;i<n/2;i++){
                if(i==(n/2)-1){
                    cout<<v[i]<<" "<<v[n-1-i];
                }
                else{
                    cout<<v[i]<<" "<<v[n-1-i]<<" ";
                }
            }
        }
        else{
            for(int i=0;i<n/2+1;i++){
                if(i==n/2){
                    cout<<v[i];
                }
                else{
                    cout<<v[i]<<" "<<v[n-1-i]<<" ";
                }
            }
        }
        cout<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
